articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Gigantic 420-foot asteroid to pass Earth soon, reveals NASA; Know how close it will come - HT Tech
articles.description: A 420 feet wide, which is comparable to a whole building in terms of size, is expected to pass Earth by a close margin tomorrow, March 23. NASA has revealed details about its speed, distance of approach and more.
articles.content: Asteroids have been passing by Earth in abundance. Just a few days ago, as many as four space rocks flew past Earth in one day. While most of these asteroids that pass by Earth closely do not pose an… [+1859 chars]

articles.title: Apple lawsuit: US accuses tech giant of monopolising smartphone market - BBC.com
articles.description: In a landmark lawsuit, the justice department alleges the company uses its power to limit competition.

articles.title: Intermittent Fasting Linked to a 91% Higher Risk of Cardiovascular Death - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Research Highlights: A study of over 20,000 adults found that those who followed an 8-hour time-restricted eating schedule, a type of intermittent fasting, had a 91% higher risk of death from cardiovascular disease. People with heart disease or cancer also ha…
articles.content: Recent research presented at the American Heart Association’s 2024 sessions found that individuals adhering to an 8-hour time-restricted eating plan had a significantly higher risk of cardiovascular … [+7689 chars]

articles.title: China tests nuclear-powered 'shrinkable' engine for Mars spaceship - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Chinese scientists have allegedly made key technological breakthroughs that could help China build a nuclear-powered spaceship for Mars and beyond.
articles.content: According to the researchers, a nuclear-powered spacecraft could complete a round trip from Earth to Mars in just three months. The prevailing scientific consensus is that this technology will be vit… [+708 chars]
